means: （音乐的）切分( syncopate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Some spirituals are based on syncopated rhythms.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一些圣歌以切分节奏为主旋律。

sentence.Network_en: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz version.

sentence.Network_cn: 音乐非常迅速 、 刺激 、 最重要的是, 它由切分音组成.

entry.tran: 切分的，切分音乐的(节拍强弱倒置)
entry.def: In syncopated music, the weak beats in the bar are stressed instead of the strong beats.

example.ex: Some spirituals are based on syncopated rhythms.
example.tran: 有一些圣歌以切分节奏为主旋律。
